item.title: A $100 Million AI Super PAC Targeted New York Democrat Alex Bores. He Thinks It Backfired
item.description: Leading the Future said it will spend millions to keep Alex Bores out of Congress. It might be helping him instead.

item.title: Instead of Fitbit’s AI Health Coach, You Could Just Have Friends
item.description: I used the public preview of Fitbit’s new AI Health Coach and became both faster and noticeably weirder.
